participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music production, with a laid-back demeanor.
participant_1.background: i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to express herself through singing and play.
participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i am in the third grade.

content.text: Or II want it to feel like I'm on the stage during a performance, and everybody's on their feet.
